# vfs_maxsymlen

**Function**

Get the maximum length of a symbolic link on a filesystem.

## Declaration

```swift
uint32_t vfs_maxsymlen(mount_t mp);
```

## Parameters

- **mp**: Mount from which to get symlink length cap.

## Return Value

Max symlink length.
title: vfs_maxsymlen
